docs.lead_paragraph: Experts monitoring freedom of expression at the United Nations and key regional organizations expressed concern Friday at the growing prevalence of "fake news" and propaganda — and alarm at public authorities denigrating the media as "lying" or "the opposition."

headline.print_headline: UN Experts Express Concern About Growth of 'Fake News'
headline.main: UN Experts Express Concern About Growth of 'Fake News'

docs.snippet: Experts monitoring freedom of expression at the United Nations and key regional organizations expressed concern Friday at the growing prevalence of "fake news" and propaganda — and alarm at public authorities denigrating the media as "lying"...

docs.lead_paragraph: The driver of an Ohio church van that crashed into a moving train, killing a woman and injuring nine children, has been sentenced to four and a half years in prison.

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump's federal hiring freeze will not apply to immigration court judges under an exception for positions that are needed for national security and public safety, the Executive Office for Immigration Review told Reuters on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Immigration Judges Exempt From Trump's Federal Hiring Freeze
headline.main: Immigration Judges Exempt From Trump's Federal Hiring Freeze

docs.lead_paragraph: After David Price consulted two renowned orthopedic doctors, the Boston Red Sox said Friday the left-hander will not need surgery or an injection in his ailing left arm.
